Gallery Desc: The Fifth Fleet departs on its voyageto the New World. One hunter has justjoined their ranks, filled with promise.
An auspicious meeting between kindredspirits is followed by a most inauspiciousdisruption. And the source of it...?
The hunter and the Handler make a high-flying escape from the unknown colossus,soaring out over the bright New World.
Stranded in the middle of the AncientForest, the pair make for the base, butare stymied by a pack of Jagras.
Preoccupied with the discovery of tracks,the Handler is suddenly leapt upon by thevery monster that had left them.
Just before they make it inside the base,the hunter is thrust in the middle of avicious struggle between two monsters.
Their impromptu adventure over, thehunter and the Handler arrive in thesafety of the Commission's base, Astera.
After having been separated duringthe incident with the colossal monster,the hunter and their Palico reunite.
At the site of the wrecked camp,the hunter and the Field Team Leaderhappen upon a scavenging Kulu-Ya-Ku.
Alerted by their scoutflies, the groupspies a Pukei-Pukei, seemingly agitatedby a mysterious, smoldering slag.
The hunter prepares to escort the scholarson their investigation of another possibletrace left by Zorah Magdaros.
In their eagerness to retrieve samples,the party is beset upon by a Barrothsmashing through a wildspire.
Having safely escorted the scholars,the hunter meets a mysteriousWyverian hunter from the First Fleet.
In search of the missing scholar, thehunter finds him cowering in fear afteran encounter with a terrifying monster.
Seeing feathers floating down, the hunterdetects something amiss, looking up tofind a new beast poised high in the trees.
The hunter attempts a risky mission: tolure the fiercely territorial Anjanath rightinto a trap.
The Commission devises a plan to captureZorah Magdaros. Dawn breaks, but will any lightalso be shed on the mystery of the Elder Crossing?
A strange new monster impedes the operation.The hunter expends every ounce of strengthto repel it, but will the operation succeed?
Hard on the heels of Zorah Magdaros,the hunter and the Handler make it acrossthe ravine to an unbelievable sight.
A pack of leering Shamos surround andclose in on a Tzitzi-Ya-Ku, when suddenlythe area is flooded with a flash of light.
On the trail of a curious, floating creature,the hunter briefly loses sight of it, onlyto finally come face to face with it.
Outfitted with new balloons, the ResearchBase rides a special current to soar intothe skies. Its destination: the Rotten Vale.
After having explored the Rotten Vale, thehunter and the Handler reconvene in camp,where they meet the Tracker.
The hunter's investigation is cut short.The earth rumbles, and a monstrosityof sharp bones barrels onto the scene.
Before they attempt to take the airshipinto the Vale to search for traces ofZorah, Legiana thwarts everyone's plans.
Still on the trail of Zorah Magdaros, thepair are set upon by an Odogaron. It setsits sights on the Handler...
The pair reunite with the Tracker, whohelps them realize the secret behindthe Elder Crossing.
The pair scale an Ancient Tree in searchof the First Wyverian, but Rathalos, Kingof the Skies, is there to greet them instead.
A territorial dispute between Noios anda Barroth turns deadly when a two-horneddevil surfaces from beneath the sand.
The operation to lure Zorah Magdarosout to sea is finally about to begin.
The Commission's operation ends insuccess. They watch in triumph asZorah Magdaros heads out to sea.

Gallery Name: The Queen of a Strange Land
Gallery Desc: The pair journey to the Coral Highlandsin search of what may have left thestrange traces. What awaits them?
A subspecies has been discovered in the NewWorld. As the investigation begins into thisphenomenon, the Admiral arrives on scene.
Led by the Admiral, the hunter and theHandler step foot into a land of towering,glittering crystals.
Within a glistening cavern, a ravenousDodogama devours crystals. Unsatiated,it turns its attention on the hunter.
The hunter finally faces off withthe devourer of Elder Dragons,the fearsome Nergigante.
Though the hunter stands triumphant overthe battle with Nergigante, unraveledmysteries yet remain.
Deep within a blistering, lava-filled cavern,tension fills the air as the ground beneaththe hunter's feet begins to shake.
A gigantic, rock-like wheel hurtlesacross the Elder's Recess, scatteringsmoldering rocks as it closes in...
A pack of Girros turn away from theirfeast to threaten the hunter, oblivious tothe writhing in the carcasses behind them.
Enraptured by the fortress of glitteringcrystals, a sudden vortex of wind liftsthe hunter out of the brief reverie.
Proceeding carefully through a lava-filledtunnel, a blast of flames assaults thehunter, who endures it to find...
The party arrives at the nexus of theEverstream, where an unknown entitypulses within its cocoon...
Having dispelled the threat of thenameless monster, the hunter retreatsas everything begins to cave in.
After many long years, the mystery of theElder Crossing has been solved. As everyonecelebrates, a Guild announcement arrives...
Though one mystery has been solved,the hunters journey ever on, towardsthe farthest horizons of the New World.
A colossal Elder Dragon marches slowlyto its unknown destination like a livingvolcano, shaking the earth with every step.
A new creature is born. Pulsing with thestrength of the energies it absorbed fromthe Everstream, it looses a terrifying cry.
The Rotten Vale: a twisted landscape ofcarcasses and a noxious vapor that eatsat the insides of any who venture there.
The Ancient Forest has been off limits tomost of the Commission, however, a terriblenightmare lies in wait for the Handler.
Nergigante appears before a recovering Teostra. The twoElder Dragons appear ready for a decisive battle, whenthe Empress makes her presence known.
Light peeks into a cave, revealing a growlingcreature whose form resembles that of agrand mountain of gold.
While chasing after a speeding cactuar, thehunter comes across a mysterious blue crystal,a Kulu-Ya-Ku, and an odd furry creature!
A gigantic meteorite crashes, leaving the surroundingarea in flames and ruin. The hunter rushes to thecrash site, only to be greeted by an unknown beast...
The witcher Geralt arrives in the New World.The Commission asks him to investigatea mysterious occurrence.
The strange incidents in the Ancient Forestare being caused by a leshen, a creaturethat controls everything within its domain.
An ancient leshen arrives in the AncientForest. It immediately assumes controlover the Jagras living there.
Geralt defeats the leshen and leaves youthe Hunter Runestone before departingAstera. But one small mystery remains...
Geralt lifts the curse cast upon thechief and the Gajalaka return thefavor with a little show.
Geralt defeats the leshen, and as heprepares to leave Astera, a Grimalkyneriding a Pukei-Pukei arrives with a gift.
Having saved the Gajalaka chief and thePukei-Pukei, Geralt returns to his own worldthrough the leshen's portal.
The Hunter and Handler make for theAncient Forest to investigate strangereports of a Legiana sighting.
The Commission gives chase to the massof Legiana aboard their airship. Whatawaits them across the open sea?
A world of blinding snow awaits theHunter and Handler as they first setfoot upon the newly discovered land.
The search for a landing spot for theairship continues, but a promising clearingbears strange new tracks in the snow.
The airship lands at the freshly securedsite and construction of a new basebegins with the Commander at the helm.
A pristine land shrouded in ice forcenturies. What awaits the Hunter there?
The duo's exploration of the HoarfrostReach to secure a supply route meetswith an impasse in the form of toppled trees.
The convoy's arrival breathes new lifeinto Seliana's construction effort, andthe Field Team Leader offers his brief.
The duo are joined by the Tracker asthey explore the Hinterlands, but aViper Tobi-Kadachi looms in the shadows.
The discovery of an old shipwreck in theReach. When and why did this vesselreach this land?
Slumber takes the Hunter soon afterarriving in the Wildspire Waste to studya new subspecies spotted there...
Shamos circle the Coral Pukei-Pukei,angry at the incursion into their turf,but the newcomer pays them little heed.
The Hunter heads into the Hoarfrost Reachin search of the Handler and the Tracker,and finds wingdrakes frozen solid.
As soon as the Handler and Tracker reporttheir findings, a singing voice resounds,accompanied by a fierce blizzard.
The Hunter's investigation in the AncientForest is met with a Nargacuga ambush.Then a Rathalos decides to butt in...
A Rathian returns to her nest to nurseher wounds. In the meanwhile, somethingeven fiercer sneaks up behind the Hunter.
The Hunter and the Handler return toAstera to find the hulking mass of afrozen Anjanath.
A Radobaan crosses paths with thebrutish scavenger Tigrex, but it soonbecomes clear who is the dominant species.
Patches of scorched earth in the Elder'sRecess leads the Hunter to a Brachydios,coated from tip to tail in green slime.
The Handler examines the shard hergrandfather gave her, said to be a stonefrom the moon. What secret does it hold?
Velkhana appears, armored in ice andfreezing the earth with each breath, itsevery wingbeat unleashing a blizzard.
A mortal blow from the Hunter laysVelkhana low, but an ominous mist oflethal cold surrounds the elder's form.
The duo take to the Hoarfrost Reachin pursuit of Velkhana. But the Trackeris still missing...
Together, the duo see the Tracker safe.The veteran can't help but see her pastself in the Handler's teary face.
A pack of Girros have an Acidic Glavenussurrounded, but each swipe of its bladedtail sends more of them flying.
An Odogaron stalking the Coral Highlandsfor prey sets its sights on the Hunterwhen a howl rings out behind them.
Hold off Velkhana's vicious attacks untilthe Dragonrazer is ready to be fired!The fate of Seliana is in your hands!
As Seliana sends up cheers at havingdriven back Velkhana, the Field TeamLeader speaks of what must come next.
The Hunter sets foot in the HoarfrostReach in pursuit of Velkhana. Whatdoes fate have in store for them!?
Velkhana falls, and the mystery of theshard is revealed. Yet celebrations arecut short by the Seeker's dire news.
The Hunter finds Nergigante thorns inthe Elder's Recessâ€”soon followed by ahailstorm of glowing red explosives.
An eerie miasma settles over the AncientForest as Vaal Hazak makes its grimprocession there.
A flash of wings pulsing with light inevery color of the rainbow catches theHunter's eye, then a torrent of water...
A team boards the airship in search ofthe Old Everwyrm, but the Tracker, swornto find it, is not among their number.
After the Hunter's hard-fought victoryagainst Nergigante, an eerie songheralds the arrival of the Old Everwyrm.
The Hunter, standing over the toppledShara Ishvalda, is joined by the others,but nature has one more surprise in store.

Gallery Name: The Moon and the Sapphire Star
Gallery Desc: The Commission looks back on the searchthat began with an exodus of Legiana andended by unmasking the Old Everwyrm.
With the long night's festivities ended,the Commission now turns its gazeforward to the next investigation.
Their pursuit of Nergigante leads theduo to a cradle of life in the New Worldwhere disparate species intermingle.
While exploring the Guiding Lands, theHunter finds a swarm of Thunderbugs,a Rathalos, and something far deadlier.
When a Yian Garuga bent on protectingits turf meets a hungry Deviljho, theHunter gets caught in the crossfire.
The Admiral, led by the scoutflies, investigatesthe Guiding Lands and arrives at a gigantic wall.But behind him, a new, terrifying menace appears!
In a volcanic region of the Guiding Lands, thehunter discovers a Kirin on edge. But thehunter isn't what the Kirin is worried about...
The Hunter discovers a new region in theGuiding Lands, and finds fresh new tracksimprinted in the snow...
Led by the Admiral and the Wyverian Hunter,the team discovers that the creature behindthe recent events is none other than...
The evil encountered in the ravine glaresdown at the tiny lives in front of itwith a penetrating gaze.
The calamity of the ravine returns,and the fate of this land lies in thehands of the Sapphire Star.
The Old Everwyrm howls from the heartof the Everstream. Armored in stone, itshakes the earth with its every motion.
